headline: White House Says Taiwan Tariffs Won’t Apply to Chips
summary: Trump said the import tariff rate for Taiwan will be set at 32%. Initially, that looked like bad news for American chip makers like Nvidia, Advanced Micro Devices, and Qualcomm, which are customers of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.

headline: Qualcomm acquires MovianAI to strengthen genAI portfolio

headline: Correction to Qualcomm Article on Tuesday
summary: Qualcomm has until April 29 to either announce a firm intention to make an offer or walk away. Qualcomm Mulls Alphawave Takeover, at 1313 GMT, incorrectly said the deadline was April 28. ...
